entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 25.
